channel.title: Information Extraction on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in Information Extraction on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Construction and Application of Materials Knowledge Graph in Multidisciplinary Materials Science via Large Language Model
item.description: Researchers created a Materials Knowledge Graph (MKG) using large language models to efficiently organize and integrate knowledge from a decade of high-quality materials science research, enhancing da…

item.title: Text2NKG: Fine-Grained N-ary Relation Extraction for N-ary relational Knowledge Graph Construction
item.description: Text2NKG: a novel framework for building N-ary relational knowledge graphs by performing fine-grained n-ary relation extraction, supporting multiple schemas, and achieving state-of-the-art accuracy.
